meanings.sent1: In some cultures, a man polygamizes by having more than one wife.
meanings.sent2: The king decided to polygamize and marry multiple queens.
meanings.sent3: The idea of polygamizing seemed overwhelming to the young man.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to polygamize her love for different partners was like juggling multiple balls.
meanings.sent5: The concept of polygamizing relationships can be complex to understand.

meanings.definition: To enter into a polygamous marriage.
meanings.sent1: She polygamizes with two husbands, living in harmony.
meanings.sent2: The couple decided to polygamize and have a joint wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent3: Polygamizing with multiple spouses can lead to interesting family dynamics.
meanings.sent4: Their decision to polygamize their love life was like intertwining different colored threads.
meanings.sent5: The idea of polygamizing their marriage was both exciting and challenging for them.
